src:
Redmi Note 8 Pro Vs Vivo Z1 Pro, Duel Sengit Smartphone Murah di Indonesia
06 Nov 2019, 07:20 by Mansur
Duel Antara Redmi Note 8 Pro dan Vivo Z1 Pro
Oketekno – Kali ini untuk Smartphone yang bakal ditandingkan dengan Redmi Note 8 Pro memiliki harga yang sama di Indonesia. Vivo Z1 Pro sekarang ini juga memiliki harga resmi Rp 3.099.000,- secara online ataupun offline. Mungkin ada beberapa yang menawarkan lebih murah atau mahal, tergantung penjualnya.
Lantas dengan persamaan harga tersebut apakah spesifikasinya juga sama? Tentu saja tidak, duo ponsel murah ini menawarkan keunggulan yang berbeda. Meski demikian, komponen yang sama juga tidak sedikit. Langsung saja simak perbandingannya sebagai berikut.

Baca Juga: 3 HP Android Pesaing Redmi Note 8 Pro Untuk Gaming, Harga Rp 2-3 Jutaan!



Layar & Desain




Copyright©Gadgetbyte Nepal

Masalah layar, keduanya sama-sama menggunakan panel IPS LCD dan memiliki luas 6.53 inci serta memiliki resolusi sebesar 1.080 x 2.340 piksel. Namun untuk kelengkapannya, Redmi sudah menawarkan pelindung Corning Gorilla Glass 5 pada bagian layarnya, sehingga lebih tahan terhadap goresan benda keras dan tajam.
Kemudian untuk body, Redmi Note 8 Pro juga masih unggul karena melapisi panel belakangnya dengan bahan material kaca + Corning Gorilla Glass 5 sehingga nampak makin Premium. Beda dengan Vivo Z1 Pro yang masih menggunakan bahan polycarbonat untuk panel belakangnya. Sedangkan untuk desain layar, tergantung selera pengguna apakah nyaman dengan poni atau lebih suka dengan hole display.

Baca Juga: 

Redmi Note 8 Pro Vs Samsung Galaxy A50s, Harga Mahal Bukan Jaminan?




Kamera Depan & Belakang




Copyright©Sandroid

Jelas tak tertandingi Redmi Note 8 Pro di kelasnya kalau soal kamera belakang, sebab sudah punya sensor kamera 64MP yang menjadi andalan. Belum lagi didukung 3 sensor lain yang terdiri dari 8MP Ultra Wide + 2MP Macro Lens + 2MP Depth Sensor. Sedangkan pesaingnya dari Vivo itu menawarkan kamera belakang 16MP + 8MP Ultra Wide + 2MP Depth Sensor saja.
Namun kalau soal kamera selfie, Vivo Z1 Pro masih bisa diacungi jempol sebab mengusung lensa kamera beresolusi 32MP. Sedangkan HP Android murah dari Redmi itu menawarkan kamera 20MP saja di level Rp 3 jutaan.

Baca Juga: Redmi Note 8 Pro Vs Realme 5 Pro, Harga Sama Tapi Spesifikasi Beda Jauh?



Performa & Memori




Copyright ©Istimewa @Yugatech

Kalau masalah performa jelas Redmi Note 8 Pro ini lebih unggul, karena sudah dipacu oleh chipset MediaTek Helio G90T. Berdasarkan data baru dari AnTuTu, Smartphone ini telah masuk ke dalam Top 10 Smartphone terkencang di kelas menengah, lihat daftarnya disini. Sedangkan Vivo Z1 Pro juga tidak jauh berbeda sebenarnya, karena sudah dilengkapi dengan chipset Snapdragon 712.
Dan masalah memori, Vivo menawarkan opsi 4GB/64GB, 6GB/64GB, dan 6GB/128GB. Sedangkan anak perusahaan Xiaomi itu menawarkan memori lebih tinggi, diantaranya 6GB/64GB, 6GB/128GB, dan 8GB/128GB.

Baca Juga: Redmi Note 8 Pro Vs Realme XT, Mana yang Lebih Rekomendasi Untuk Dibeli?



Baterai & Fast Charging




Copyright ©Selular

Vivo Z1 Pro bisa dikatakan juara kapasitas baterai dalam perbandingan ini, karena punya 5.000 mAh sebagai daya nyala. Sedangkan untuk Redmi Note 8 Pro cuman punya baterai 4.500 mAh saja, sehingga untuk daya aktif mungkin sedikit lebih pendek. Meski demikian, keduanya memiliki teknologi pengisian daya cepat dengan daya tegangan sama, 18W.

Baca Juga: 

Redmi Note 8 Pro Vs Samsung Galaxy M30s, Duel Raja Kamera dan Baterai




Fitur Lain




Copyright©CakapCakap

Masalah fingerprint keduanya sama-sama ditanamkan di bagian punggung ponsel. Akan tetapi ada 2 fitur yang cuman dimiliki oleh Redmi Note 8 Pro, yakni NFC dan Infrared. Kedua fitur tersebut tidak tersedia pada Vivo Z1 Pro.
baca juga: Ketika Redmi Note 8 Pro Test Untuk Gaming, Hasil yang Mengejutkan!
text:
Redmi Note 8 Pro Vs Vivo Z1 Pro, Cheap Smartphone Fierce Duel in Indonesia
Nov 6 2019, 07:20 by Mansur
Duel Between Redmi Note 8 Pro and Vivo Z1 Pro
Oketekno - This time for a Smartphone that will be competed with the Redmi Note 8 Pro has the same price in Indonesia. Vivo Z1 Pro now also has an official price of IDR 3,099,000, - online or offline. There may be some that offer cheaper or more expensive, depending on the seller.
Then with the price equation are the specifications also the same? Of course not, this cheap mobile duo offers different advantages. However, the same components are also not small. Immediately, see the comparison as follows.

Also Read: 3 Android Phones of Redmi Note 8 Pro Competitors for Gaming, Priced at IDR 2-3 Millions!



Screen & Design




Copyright © Gadgetbyte Nepal

Screen problems, they both use IPS LCD panels and are 6.53 inches wide and have a resolution of 1,080 x 2,340 pixels. But for completeness, Redmi has offered a protective Corning Gorilla Glass 5 on the screen, so it is more resistant to scratches hard and sharp objects.
Then for the body, the Redmi Note 8 Pro is also still superior because it covers the back panel with glass + Corning Gorilla Glass 5 material so that it looks more Premium. Unlike the Vivo Z1 Pro which still uses polycarbonate material for the rear panel. As for the screen design, depending on the user's taste whether comfortable with bangs or prefer a hole display.

Also Read:

Redmi Note 8 Pro Vs Samsung Galaxy A50s, Expensive Price Is Not a Guarantee?




Front & Rear Cameras




Copyright © Sandroid

Obviously unmatched Redmi Note 8 Pro in its class when it comes to rear cameras, because it already has a 64MP camera sensor that is a mainstay. Not to mention supported by 3 other sensors consisting of 8MP Ultra Wide + 2MP Macro Lens + 2MP Depth Sensor. While its competitors from Vivo offer a rear camera 16MP + 8MP Ultra Wide + 2MP Depth Sensor only.
But when it comes to selfie cameras, the Vivo Z1 Pro can still be thumbs up because it carries a 32MP resolution camera lens. While the cheap Android phone from Redmi offers a 20MP camera at only Rp. 3 million.

Also Read: Redmi Note 8 Pro Vs Real 5 Pro, Same Price But Different Specifications Are Different?



Performance & Memory




Copyright © Special @ Yugatech

If the performance problem is clear, the Redmi Note 8 Pro is superior, because it has been driven by the MediaTek Helio G90T chipset. Based on new data from AnTuTu, this Smartphone has entered into the Top 10 of the fastest smartphone in the middle class, see the list here. While the Vivo Z1 Pro is also not much different actually, because it is equipped with Snapdragon 712 chipset.
And memory problems, Vivo offers 4GB / 64GB, 6GB / 64GB, and 6GB / 128GB options. While Xiaomi's subsidiary offers higher memory, including 6GB / 64GB, 6GB / 128GB, and 8GB / 128GB.

Also Read: Redmi Note 8 Pro Vs Real XT, Which Are More Recommendations to Buy?



Battery & Fast Charging




Copyright © Cellular

Vivo Z1 Pro can be said to be the champion of battery capacity in this comparison, because it has 5,000 mAh as power on. As for the Redmi Note 8 Pro, it only has 4,500 mAh battery, so the active power might be a little shorter. However, both have fast charging technology with the same voltage power, 18W.

Also Read:

Redmi Note 8 Pro Vs Samsung Galaxy M30s, Duel King Camera and Battery




Other Features




Copyright © Able to speak

Both fingerprints are embedded in the back of the phone. However, there are only 2 features that are owned by Redmi Note 8 Pro, namely NFC and Infrared. Both of these features are not available on Vivo Z1 Pro.
Also read: When the Redmi Note 8 Pro Test For Gaming, Shocking Results!
